skins.shipDescription: I am the CPU of Leanbox, Green Heart. No matter who the enemy is, I will not hold back. Are you ready?
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the CPU of Leanbox, Green Heart. I have come from the world of Gamindustri. There's no need to be shy, you can come as close as you'd like.
skins.acquisition: I am the CPU of Leanbox, Green Heart. No matter who the enemy is, I will not hold back. Are you ready?
skins.login: You sure took your time. Black tea is best enjoyed hot, you know?
skins.details: It seems like someone has been captivated by my beauty.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Size is justice, don't you agree?
skins.secretaryIdle2: ... Oh dear, my apologies. I was just thinking about the next guild battle.
skins.secretaryTouch: This processing unit can't be taken off, you know. Ehehe, just kidding.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: It's not a good idea to keep playing these distasteful pranks.

skins.shipDescription: Commander, are you having a good time? Ehehe, I certainly am. It's not often that we get to relax like this. Why don't we head out and enjoy the breeze?
